liquibase.ant.BaseLiquibaseTask

liquibase.ant.BaseLiquibaseTask Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for all Ant LiquiBase tasks.

This class sets up LiquiBase and defines parameters that are common to all tasks.
